title: A Scandal in Bohemia
episode_desc: Sherlock Holmes finds himself evenly matched when he is employed by the King of Bohemia to retrieve an indiscreet photograph from the American actress and singer, Irene Adler.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Dancing Men
episode_desc: A gentleman is baffled when the childish drawings of little dancing men terrify his American wife. Sherlock Holmes soon discovers why.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Naval Treaty
episode_desc: An unknown thief steals an important naval treaty from a Foreign Office clerk; Sherlock Holmes sets out to find it.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Solitary Cyclist
episode_desc: A strange man on a bicycle follows a young music teacher as she bicycles on a lonely road to and from the city.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Crooked Man
episode_desc: Col. Barclay is found dead and his wife is arrested for the murder, but Holmes is convinced a missing door key will reveal the true killer.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Speckled Band

show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Blue Carbuncle
episode_desc: When the Countess of Morcar's priceless blue carbuncle is stolen, a reformed thief is charged with the crime.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Copper Beeches
episode_desc: Mr. Rucastle's odd requirements for governess Violet Hunter, such as cutting her hair and wearing certain dresses, alarm her so she seeks Holmes' advice.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Greek Interpreter
episode_desc: An unsavory gang kidnaps a Greek interpreter and forces him to relate their demands to an abductee who knows only the Greek tongue.

title: The Norwood Builder
episode_desc: When a notorious retired builder is found dead, his recently-named heir is the prime suspect.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Resident Patient
episode_desc: A mysterious man sets up a new doctor in a posh practice for a percentage of his fees.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Red Headed League
episode_desc: What seems at first to be a harmless prank played upon a red-headed man is soon revealed to be much more: a sinister scheme devised by the Napoleon of Crime.
show_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: The Final Problem
episode_desc: Holmes and Watson travel to Europe to escape Moriarty's vengeance.
